/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
